1417400.name: Escape Dinosaur Island
1417400.description:
In the future world, a super boy accidentally crossed an island in the age of dinosaurs while driving a spaceship. The spaceship was forced to land and damaged. He can only stick to the island day and night, protect himself and eliminate the dinosaur and mecha dinosaur boss who attacked him. When the sun rises again, the boy has accumulated enough energy to repair the spaceship and return.

This is a dinosaur themed game for children. The game image can be customized privately, and developers can embed this image into the game through a front and side photo. Players can truly enjoy playing the game with their digital characters. Interested friends can add WeChat 13146366158.
1417400.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
